titleStmt.title: Two discourses the first concerning the spirit of Martin Luther and the original of the Reformation : the second concerning the celibacy of the clergy.
titleStmt.author: R. H., 1609-1678.

notesStmt.note: R.H. is a pseudonym of Abraham Woodhead--Cf. Wing, DNB, LCNA.
"A discourse concerning the celibacy of the clergy" has special t.p., pagination, and signatures. It was also published separately, and appears as Wing no. W3445 at Reel 855:3.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
Considerations concerning the spirit of M. Luther and the original of the Reformation -- A discourse concerning the celibacy of the clergy.
